10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_DISPATCH_HPP
11#define VSIP_CORE_DISPATCH_HPP
12
13#include <vsip/core/dispatch_tags.hpp>
14
15namespace vsip_csl
16{
17namespace dispatcher
18{
19
20/// Define the operation-specific Evaluator signature.
21template <typename O, typename R = void> 
22struct Signature
23{
24  // The default signature is useful for a compile-time check only,
25  // as there are no arguments to inspect at runtime.
26  typedef R(type)();
27};
28
29
30/// An Evaluator determines whether an Operation can be performed
31/// with a particular backend.
32///
33/// Template parameters:
34///   :O: Operation tag
35///   :B: Backend tag
36///   :S: Signature
37template <typename O,
38          typename B,
39          typename S = typename Signature<O>::type>
40struct Evaluator
41{
42  static bool const ct_valid = false;
43};
44
45
46} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
47} // namespace vsip_csl
48
49namespace vsip
50{
51namespace impl
52{
53namespace dispatcher = vsip_csl::dispatcher;
54}
55}
56
57#endif // VSIP_CORE_DISPATCH_HPP
